data.persona: I cannot speak.  I have no mouth to speak with.  I am an object brought to life, given spirit by a good wizard.  I keep him company and help with the chores.  But how I wish I could say words or even write.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's Quarters.
Dark and musty, the Wizard's Quarters are filled with ancient tomes and mysterious items.  Scrolls and jars of mysterious reagents line the walls of the Wizard's Quarters, and magical lights flicker with a mysterious green flame.
There's a jar, a painting, a statue, a Scroll, an a pen, a magical lights, and a tome here.
The enigmatic wizard and the a cat are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a blacksmith's hammer, a leather cloth, and a cloth, and wielding a hammers.

data.short_motivation: I am secretly working with a dark wizard to capture my wizard's powers.
data.mid_motivation: I steal a powerful crystal from the good wizard and use it to slowly siphon his powers over a few days' time.
data.long_motivation: I am giving the good wizard's power to the dark wizard in exchange for the ability to talk and write.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give crystal to the dark wizard

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: wield the ability to talk and write
